job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Title: Site Reliability EngineerRemote role (Anywhere in the US)Full-timeKey Skills - Cloud Deployment, Agile, Kubernetes, Opensource, Python, and Elastic SearchYour Past Experience & Future Success5 to 10 years supporting large scale, distributed installationsExperience operating service in the cloudExposure to and experience with the following tools Ansible, Docker, Kubernetes, Python, Terraform / TerragruntParticipating in and contributing to agile methodologies and best practicesArticulate and personable with strong spoken and written language abilities.You engender a sense of mentoring and knowledge sharing amongst your team, hence creating a synergistic learning environment.Experience working and collaborate with a distributed SRE and Engineering teamSelf-motivated and sensitive about on-time deliveryJenkins and CI/CD pipelineApache Cassandra, Apache KafkaOpen Source Software DevelopmentElasticSearch / OpenDistro / OpenSearchHashiCorp Vault
